conclusion: Liquid will flow out from A, B, C, and D and pass through baffles to reach containers E, F, or G.
Liquid A starts at the top left and flows vertically downward.

premise: Liquid A flows vertically downward and encounters a horizontal baffle.
conclusion: The horizontal baffle redirects liquid A horizontally towards the left.

premise: Liquid A flows horizontally left and hits another baffle.
conclusion: The second baffle guides liquid A downward.

premise: Liquid A flows downward after being guided by the second baffle.
conclusion: Liquid A flows into container E.
Liquid B starts at the top center and flows vertically downward.

premise: Liquid B flows vertically downward and encounters a horizontal baffle.
conclusion: The horizontal baffle redirects liquid B horizontally towards the right.

premise: Liquid B flows horizontally right and encounters another baffle.
conclusion: Liquid B continues flowing horizontally until it reaches the bottom.

premise: Liquid B flows horizontally until it reaches the bottom.
conclusion: Liquid B flows into container F.
Liquid C starts at the top right and flows vertically downward.

premise: Liquid C flows vertically downward and encounters a horizontal baffle.
conclusion: The horizontal baffle redirects liquid C horizontally towards the right.

premise: Liquid C flows horizontally right and hits another baffle.
conclusion: The second baffle guides liquid C downward.

premise: Liquid C flows downward after being guided by the second baffle.
conclusion: Liquid C flows into container G.
Liquid D starts at the top far right and flows vertically downward.

premise: Liquid D flows vertically downward and encounters a horizontal baffle.
conclusion: The horizontal baffle redirects liquid D horizontally towards the left.

premise: Liquid D flows horizontally left and encounters another baffle.
conclusion: Liquid D continues flowing horizontally until it reaches the bottom.

premise: Liquid D flows horizontally until it reaches the bottom.
conclusion: Liquid D flows into container E.
